meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 12 ounces.
meanings.sent1: I measured the flour using a libra of weight.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a libra of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The baker mistakenly added a whole libra of salt instead of sugar!
meanings.sent4: Her love for baking weighed more than a libra of gold.
meanings.sent5: The libra of apples was just enough for the pie.

meanings.definition: The seventh sign of the zodiac, represented by a pair of scales.
meanings.sent1: Her zodiac sign is Libra, symbolized by scales.
meanings.sent2: People born under Libra are said to be diplomatic.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, she dressed up as a balancing Libra scale.
meanings.sent4: The Libra constellation shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The Libra's scales tipped in perfect balance.

meanings.definition: A constellation in the southern hemisphere.
meanings.sent1: We gazed at the beautiful Libra constellation in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The Libra constellation is also known as the Scales.
meanings.sent3: The Libra constellation seemed to wink at us from afar.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the Libra constellation formed a perfect pattern.
meanings.sent5: The Libra constellation guided sailors on their journey.
